name: Juan Torres
description:
On April 12, 2019, MCSO deputies responded to a domestic violence call in Buckeye, Arizona.

Minutes after law enforcement arrive, Juan Torres, 39, was shot after he threw a wrench at two of the deputies , police said.

Read more about the incident here: https://bit.ly/2IskwIe
